thread.title: JPMorgan Poaches Bank of America Energy Banker for EMEA

author: Ben Dummett
title: JPMorgan Poaches Bank of America Energy Banker for EMEA

organizations.name: jpmorgan poaches bank of america energy banker

text:
JPMorgan & Chase Co. has poached a senior energy investment banker from rival Bank of America Merrill Lynch to oversee oil and gas producers in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, as strengthening crude prices signal the prospect of greater deal activity in the sector.
Based in London, Paul Wheeler will focus on the major oil firms, such as Royal Dutch Shell PLC, as well as the regionâ€™s independent upstream energy companies. He is set to take up his new role this spring following his so-called gardening leave, according... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
